sentence.Network_en: Wade placed his chilled hands on the radiator and warmed them.
sentence.Network_cn: 韦德把冰凉的双手放在暖气片上取暖。

sentence.Network_en: Smoke was used to simulate steam coming from a smashed radiator.
sentence.Network_cn: 用烟来模拟从撞碎的散热器中冒出的蒸气。

sentence.Network_en: a central heating system with a radiator in each room
sentence.Network_cn: 每个房间都配有一个散热器的中央供暖系统

entry.def: A radiator is a hollow metal device, usually connected by pipes to a central heating system, that is used to heat a room.

entry.tran: （汽车等的）水箱，冷却器，散热器
entry.def: The radiator in a car is the part of the engine which is filled with water in order to cool the engine.

means.word_mean: 2. heater consisting of a series of pipes for circulating steam or hot water to heat rooms or buildings

3. a mechanism consisting of a metal honeycomb through which hot fluids circulate; heat is transferred from the fluid through the honeycomb to the airstream that is created either by the motion of the vehicle or by a fan

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发光的, 辐射的, 容光焕发的
stems_affixes.word_buile: radi辐射,光线+ant……的→adj.发光的, 辐射的, 容光焕发的
radi辐射,光线+o状态+active积极的, 能起作用的→adj.放射性的,有放射能的
rad=radi辐射,光线+ar器→n.雷达, 电波探测器
radi辐射,光线+al表名词→n.光线, 射线

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发散, 发光, 发热, 辐射, 放射, 放射线, 放射物
stems_affixes.word_buile: radiate[v.发光；放射，辐射；散布，传播]+ion表名词→n.发散, 发光, 发热, 辐射, 放射, 放射线, 放射物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 散热器, 水箱, 冷却器, 电暖炉, 辐射体
stems_affixes.word_buile: radiate[v.发光；放射，辐射；散布，传播]+or物器→radiator散热器, 水箱, 冷却器, 电暖炉, 辐射体
radi辐射,光线+o物→收音机，无线电
radi辐射,光线+o状态+activity活动→n.放射性，放射现象
radi辐射,光线+um→镭是一种高度放射性的金属元素

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发光；放射，辐射；散布，传播
stems_affixes.word_buile: radi辐射,光线+ate表动词→v.发光；放射，辐射；散布，传播
radi辐射,光线+o物→收音机，无线电

sentences.en: She placed the handkerchief on a piece of paper to dry on the radiator.
sentences.cn: 她把手帕放在一张纸上放到暖气上去烘干。

sentences.en: The two ends of the pipeline are connected with the radiator.
sentences.cn: 管道的两端与暖气片相连接。

means.word_mean: 汽车引擎的冷却器, 散热器,（车辆或飞机发动机的）冷却器，水箱

sentences.en: The car has a fancooled radiator.
sentences.cn: 这部汽车有一个由风扇散热的冷却器。

sentences.en: Top up the radiator before making a long journey.
sentences.cn: 在长途旅行前加满散热器。

sentences.en: Removal of excess heat is accomplished by means of a radiator.
sentences.cn: 通过散热器完成多余热量的排出。
